ingredients: 4 slices whole-grain bread, 1  avocado, halved and pitted, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil,   +   1/2  lemon, juiced,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper,   +   1/2 teaspoon onion powder,   +   1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
nutrition: Total Fat 10g 13%, Saturated Fat 2g 8%, Sodium 430mg 19%, Total Carbohydrate 17g 6%, Dietary Fiber 6g 20%, Total Sugars 2g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 8mg 39%, Calcium 42mg 3%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 334mg 7%
